About Me

Hi, I am Pranita Gandhi. I have completed a Diploma in Full Stack Web Development from Code Institute . I am former Biochemistry/Research Technician who loves problem solving and troubleshooting experiments. I am confident in Front-End and Back-End Technologies which include : HTML, CSS , JavaScript, jQuery, GitHub Bootstrap and Materialize. Back-End Technologies include : Python, Django, Flask, Heroku. Please see my Projects which contain front-end and back-end technologies

Additionally to coding I love cycling, running and sketching in my free time.
